meta.title: Our Sixth Anniversary
meta.subtitle: Six years, one heartbeat, endless gratitude.
meta.passcodeHint: Hint: the date that changed my life (MMDD)

storyCards.caption: One hello, and suddenly life felt brighter.
storyCards.noteBody: I did not know then how important that moment would become. I just knew I wanted one more conversation with you, and then one more after that.

storyCards.caption: Our late-night talks became my favorite place.
storyCards.noteBody: Somewhere between the laughter, the teasing, and the long calls, my world quietly started orbiting around you.

storyCards.caption: We chose each other, not just once, but forever.
storyCards.noteBody: Our wedding day was magical, but what means even more is every ordinary day after it where we kept choosing love, patience, and us.

storyCards.caption: Trips, chai breaks, random selfies, and tiny rituals.
storyCards.noteBody: You make every place feel like home. Even the smallest moments become memories when I am with you.

storyCards.caption: Even tough days felt lighter because we were a team.
storyCards.noteBody: Thank you for standing beside me through everything. Your calm, your kindness, and your courage have carried us through more than words can hold.

storyCards.caption: You are still my safest place and my happiest thought.
storyCards.noteBody: After six years, my favorite part of every day is still you. Your smile, your voice, your presence, your love.

storyCards.caption: Thank you for loving me in all my versions.
storyCards.noteBody: Thank you for celebrating my highs, holding me in my lows, and believing in me even when I doubted myself.

storyCards.caption: Chapter six is beautiful. Forever is waiting.
storyCards.noteBody: Happy anniversary, my love. If I had to choose again, in every lifetime, in every universe, I would still choose you.

quiz.question: Which moment made me realize you were 'the one'?
quiz.revealNote: It was never one single moment, it was the way you loved in every moment.

quiz.question: What is my favorite thing about us?
quiz.revealNote: No matter where we are, we find reasons to smile together.

quiz.question: What do I admire most about you?
quiz.revealNote: You are gentle and strong at the same time, and I fall for that every day.

quiz.question: What do I want more of with you?
quiz.revealNote: Adventures with you are fun, but even quiet evenings with you feel magical.

quiz.question: If I could choose one person in every lifetime?
quiz.revealNote: Always you. In every world, in every story, in every life.

surprise.envelopeMessage:
Happy sixth anniversary, my love.

Thank you for every smile, every hug, every hard conversation, every silly joke, and every quiet moment where your hand found mine.

You have made my life softer, stronger, and far more beautiful than I ever imagined.

I am proud of everything we have built and even more excited for everything still ahead of us.

No matter where life takes us, my favorite place will always be right beside you.

I love you, endlessly.
